scripts.test:e2e:husky: set NOCK_TEST=true && cross-env NODE_ENV=test bash ./test/setup/destroy.sh && cross-env NODE_ENV=test bash ./test/setup/setup.sh && jest --config ./test/jest-e2e.json --detectOpenHandles
scripts.test:watch: cross-env NODE_ENV=test bash ./test/setup/destroy.sh && cross-env NODE_ENV=test bash ./test/setup/setup.sh && jest --watchAll
scripts.test:cov: cross-env NODE_ENV=test bash ./test/setup/destroy.sh && cross-env NODE_ENV=test bash ./test/setup/setup.sh && jest --coverage
scripts.test:debug: cross-env NODE_ENV=test bash ./test/setup/destroy.sh && cross-env NODE_ENV=test bash ./test/setup/setup.sh && node --inspect-brk -r tsconfig-paths/register -r ts-node/register node_modules/.bin/jest --runInBand
scripts.test:e2e:nock: set NOCK_TEST=true && cross-env DEBUG=nock.* NODE_ENV=test bash ./test/setup/destroy.sh && cross-env NODE_ENV=test bash ./test/setup/nock-setup.sh && jest --config ./test/jest-e2e.json --watchAll --detectOpenHandles
scripts.test:e2e: set NOCK_TEST= && cross-env DEBUG=nock.* NODE_ENV=test bash ./test/setup/destroy.sh && cross-env NODE_ENV=test bash ./test/setup/setup.sh && jest --config ./test/jest-e2e.json --watchAll --detectOpenHandles
scripts.test:e2e:specific: set NOCK_TEST= && cross-env DEBUG=nock.* NODE_ENV=test bash ./test/setup/destroy.sh && cross-env NODE_ENV=test bash ./test/setup/setup.sh && jest --config ./test/jest-e2e-specific.json --watchAll --detectOpenHandles
